original_title: Sri Lanka’s mid day shares edge down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edge down in mid day trade, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was down 0.11 percent or 13.03 points to 11,636.96, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.63 percent or 21.60 points to 3,426.99
Losers during mid day trade were Commercial Bank, John Keells Holdings and Sampath Bank. (Colombo/Aug11/2023)
